ygData.subject: RE: Hero Bracers
ygData.msgSnippet: I did the quest.  Carrillion took my faction high enough for it to work.  I was indifferent to start and he wouldn t give it to me.  After playing the song he
ygData.messageBody:
I did the quest. Carrillion took my faction high enough for it to work. I
was indifferent to start and he wouldn't give it to me. After playing the
song he changed his tune though. I don't think you need to do the first
part of the quest, but I did it anyway just to be sure. Not like its very
hard, I was able to get off the boat, kill the cat, and get back on the boat
before it departed.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Steven S. Klug [mailto:sklug@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 12:11 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Hero Bracers


From: "Steven S. Klug" <sklug@...>

Minor quest spoiler below.....


















I recently acquired a nice set of Mino Hero shackles, and I was
wondering if anyone here has done the Hero Bracers quest. I ask because
the descriptions of this quest on several web pages say it is for Human
Steel Warriors only. But I have never found a quest that couldn't be
done with suitable faction adjustments (via Carrillion). Luckily, I am
a half elf (one of the races allowed to use the bracer according to the
item description). Also, can you do it without doing the first part of
the quest? Or is that required as is implied by the quest descriptions?

Laluni Songhammer, Level 29 bard of E'Ci.

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
